name: mountain landscape using perling noise
description: I used perlin noises for the birds and the mountains, This is an Asian mountain landscape in water color style, I would like to create a peaceful feeling. Future possible steps might be have Chinese letters writing, add peaceful music, let the bird fly.

name: mountain landscape 2
description: It is a varation from mountain 1, now there is an animation of sunrise and sunset, the sky becomes darker when the mountains cover the sun, to increase the feeling of How Time Flies.

name: mountain landscape 3
description: It is a varation from mountain 1, now there is an animation of sunrise and sunset, I create a fading trace behind the moving sun, and the birds are also have a slight movement, to increase the feeling of How Time Flies.

name: mountain landscape 4
description: sound effect added, to create a ethereal feeling.

name: Gravitational attraction variation

name: Flow fields variation
description: The combination of the structured circle and the fluid, feel the associations with nature, gives a depressed feeling when it becomes darker.
